title: Unable to load library 'libSkiaSharp'
body:
### Description

Project .NET 4.8.  
SkiaSharp, SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux, SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.NoDependencies, SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.macOS, SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.WebAssembly, SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Win32, SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.Common, SkiaSharp.Views.WindowsForms Nuget packages installed.
Project works on Windows machine.  Version of Nuget 2.88.6

Unable to load library 'libSkiaSharp' throwed. Any ideas?

### Code

```
public byte[] Resize(byte[] fileContents, int maxWidth, int maxHeight, Quality quality = Quality.High)
{
    using (var ms = new MemoryStream(fileContents))
    {
        using (var sourceBitmap = SKBitmap.Decode(ms)) - exception here
        {
            /////
        }
    }
}
```

### Expected Behavior

_No response_

### Actual Behavior

_No response_
